thread.title: Aldi to launch online offer as annual profits slide

title: Aldi to launch online offer as annual profits slide
text:
28 Sep 2015 | By Edward Devlin 
Profits at Aldi have fallen as the discounter invested heavily in price and stores to stay ahead of its bigger rivals and grow sales to Â£6.89bn Available to members only
